Hey guys, been looking for this game since ages!!! However, do u face the same problem as I do?

I find the game runs a lil' sluggish. It's way to laggy!

My current system's running on a pentium 4 Windows XP. I read somewhere that this may happen. 

Is there anything that can be done?

I've found the solution for that lag problem !!
Set the properties of your Street Wars to "Run this program in compatibility mode for Windows 95"

Thanks for the upload.

Works perfect for me under Vista Ultimate x64.
